title: Bug 134949: Themes nest in other library
description: Themes are nesting in other library
OB: When attempting to drop themes from Library B into the layout of Library A in the library explorer, an error message appears stating that the library namespace 'B' already exists.
EB: Dropping themes from Library B into the layout of Library A should not result in an error related to the existing library namespace. The operation should be allowed without any issues.
SR:
1. Open Library A in the library explorer.
2. Drag and drop themes from Library B into the layout of Library A.
3. Observe if any error messages related to the library namespace 'B' appear. Verify that the operation is successful without errors.
